00018 #include <string>
00019 
00020 #include "TrayIcon.h"
00021 
00022 TrayIcon::TrayIcon(const HWND hWnd, const unsigned int callbackMessage) :
00023         m_uid(0),
00024         m_hWnd(hWnd),
00025         m_callbackMessage(callbackMessage),
00026         m_added(false)
00027 {
00028         m_uid = GetCurrentProcessId();
00029 }
00030 
00031 TrayIcon::~TrayIcon()
00032 {
00033         remove();
00034 }
00035 
00036 void TrayIcon::setIcon(const HICON hIcon)
00037 {
00038         NOTIFYICONDATA ntd = {0};
00039 
00040         ntd.cbSize = sizeof(NOTIFYICONDATA);
00041         ntd.hWnd = m_hWnd;
00042         ntd.uID = m_uid;
00043         ntd.hIcon = hIcon;
00044         ntd.uFlags = NIF_ICON;
00045 
00046         if (!m_added)
00047         {
00048                 ntd.uFlags |= NIF_MESSAGE;
00049                 ntd.uCallbackMessage = m_callbackMessage;
00050                 Shell_NotifyIcon(NIM_ADD, &ntd);
00051                 m_added = true;
00052         }
00053         else
00054         {
00055                 Shell_NotifyIcon(NIM_MODIFY, &ntd);
00056         }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void TrayIcon::setToolTip(const char* toolTip)
00060 {
00061         NOTIFYICONDATA ntd = {0};
00062 
00063         ntd.cbSize = sizeof(NOTIFYICONDATA);
00064         ntd.hWnd = m_hWnd;
00065         ntd.uID = m_uid;
00066         ntd.uFlags = NIF_TIP;
00067         memcpy(ntd.szTip, toolTip, strlen(toolTip));
00068 
00069         Shell_NotifyIcon(NIM_MODIFY, &ntd);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void TrayIcon::remove()
00073 {
00074         NOTIFYICONDATA ntd = {0};
00075 
00076         ntd.cbSize = sizeof(NOTIFYICONDATA);
00077         ntd.hWnd = m_hWnd;
00078         ntd.uID = m_uid;
00079 
00080         Shell_NotifyIcon(NIM_DELETE, &ntd);
00081         m_added = false;
00082 }
00083 
00084 void TrayIcon::setVersion(const unsigned int version)
00085 {
00086         NOTIFYICONDATA ntd = {0};
00087 
00088         ntd.cbSize = sizeof(NOTIFYICONDATA);
00089         ntd.hWnd = m_hWnd;
00090         ntd.uID = m_uid;
00091         ntd.uVersion = 0x500;
00092 
00093         Shell_NotifyIcon(NIM_SETVERSION, &ntd);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void TrayIcon::setInfo(const char* message, const char* title, const unsigned int timeout, const long icon)
00097 {
00098         NOTIFYICONDATA ntd = {0};
00099 
00100         ntd.cbSize = sizeof(NOTIFYICONDATA);
00101         ntd.hWnd = m_hWnd;
00102         ntd.uID = m_uid;
00103         ntd.uFlags = NIF_INFO;
00104         ntd.uTimeout = timeout;
00105         memcpy(ntd.szInfo, message, strlen(message));
00106         memcpy(ntd.szInfoTitle, title, strlen(title));
00107         ntd.dwInfoFlags = icon;
00108 
00109         Shell_NotifyIcon(NIM_MODIFY, &ntd);
00110 }
